Journal.Title: The National medical journal of India

Article.ArticleTitle: Co-WIN and Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission: The way forward.

Abstract.AbstractText: As Covid-19 becomes, for better or worse, an endemic disease, the future of the revolutionary Covid-19 Vaccine Intelligence Network (Co-WIN) platform needs to be considered seriously. Rather than being made obsolete, the Co-WIN platform can serve as a stepping stone to catalyse a true digital healthcare revolution in India if steps are taken to harness its features and data for varied uses as part of the Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission. By bringing these features to other vaccinations, as well as integrating outbreak data from the Integrated Health Information Platform for public knowledge and awareness, disease responses can become faster and more public-driven (rather than government-driven as currently). This will also create a data pool that will be of value in post-vaccination monitoring.
